content.detailedDescription:
Stepped out onto the back porch with my girlfriend facing due north. noticed what looked like an orange flare to our right, 45 degrees just above the horizon. it seemed to drift due west and slightly lost altitude until it was almost due north of us approximately 5oo' away and 500' up. i felt it knew we were observing it and it was going to come toward us. i said "in the name of jesus do not come here". about 2 seconds later it turned due north and at a slight angle headed away from us. we watched it for about 10 seconds till we could no longer see it. it had been raining a lot that day and their was still heavy cloud cover. 
it had a slight pulse to it but i'm not sure if it was my eyes trying to bring it into better focus or if it was the object. when it was moving w/b it appeared to be drifting but i believe it was moving quicker than i realized. the total time of observation was less than 3 minutes. 
i am a police officer.
content.summary: Looked like an orange flare drifting w/b turned due north till out of visual range.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out of the building where i worked and walked to my car. when i got to my car my back was turned to the building, at this point i felt as if there was something behind me. immediately i told myself i was looking at an alien craft - i just felt this to be true. the thing just stopped, it didn't move. i stood there in a dark parking lot, alone, staring up at this thing and was never so terrified in my life. i thought i was going to be abducted. i stood frozen, i could not move. i remember feeling that if i did not try to get away it might take me but i just couldn't move. right after i experienced the fear and had these thoughts, the thing just left. it struck me as odd that:

a. it was in the parking lot, such an odd place, not near anything of known interest.
b. it was  so low.
c. when it left its speed was somewhere between slow and moderately fast.
content.summary: Saw object while coming out of work at night.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was gardening in a crouched position in my back yard, it was still very much light outside. for some unknown reason i looked up to the sky, seeing to my amazement a rectangular transparent object, pretty flat, coming up from behind the neighbours' treetop, flying or rather floating a straight path to the ne, right over my head. a rectangular object, as if made of plexiglass or something similar, with a circle of bright white light in the middle and some greyish/metallic construction/beams could be seen along the sides on the inside. it didnt seem to be manned or made to be. it seemed really close which made me think at first it wasnt that big and flying low, like a helicopter. later i began to doubt this as i found other reports from the netherlands which sounded like the same thing, but those people said it must have been a bigger object, as big as or bigger than a plane. my main reason for iniatially assuming it couldnt be bigger than a helicopter was disbelief actually, "how could no one see this". well i did find a report from the other side of town describing what could've been the same thing seen from the side; more of a rod shaped thing. 

i felt disbelief at first when i saw it, then i thought " is this what they, whomever they be, are watching us with now". i tried to distinguish anything that would tell who made and controlled it, but there was nothing. 

i lost sight of it as it continued on it's way in a straight unwavering path, dissapearing behind backyard fences of neighbouring houses. it made no sound at all, i tried to listen for any hums or anything while it was overhead but nothing. no exhaust. the only feature that "did" something involving energy seemed to be the light glowing in the middle, for there was nothing else visible that would be present in or on the object. the whole thing looked like it consisted of only three features: the outer rectangular shell looked made out of plexiglass or glass, there were the beams along the insides which looked like they were there to hold the construction, and the white circular light in the middle of the object. 

the drawing i made of it is actually two drawings in one; the top part is how it looked while overhead, the bottom part is how it looked like while flying away. i apologize for the fuzzyness, it is bcause i had to take a picture of the drawing with my phone to get it onto the computer. 

*i put "reflective" for the object's surface, but was just transparent, see-through, no color in it at all.
content.summary: Transparent rectangular ufo right overhead

content.detailedDescription: It was at 9, i was observing the sky. i saw the ufo mentioned in the photo. it revolved 2 to 3 times then went with a great speed in the sky. the light was too bright. i quickly clicked it's photos. i could get only two as it disappeared.
content.summary: The speed it had was too much,  it had bright lights.

content.detailedDescription: First and foremost i had witnessed an object like this on november of last year, 2013. in november of last year the object was pulsating red light and appeared to manipulate its own light as if it were something tangible like clay. it slithered in the sky as if it were a snake, then formed into a ball of red light that shone brighter and brighter as to give a warning. it seemed that it somehow there was a connection as if telepathy, i think it read my thoughts. after the object shined the red light in a spherical shape, it suddenly turned off and decided to travel in a diagonal line path away from me; it turned from a ball of red light into a diamond shaped crystal that seemed to want to camouflage itself with the night. this had happened on november of last year, fast forward july 19 of 2014 and there was a second sighting about 10 pm after i had finished watching a movie, there was an instinct that told me to look out my balcony from my 10 story apartment. as soon as i had looked into my balcony, i saw a white blip or light shined and a red light form after it, it appeared to head towards my apartment and out of fight or flight instinct i felt somewhat threatened. i was alone in my apartment and decided to run out of my apartment a concerned neighbour opened his door to asked me what was happening, i told him i saw a ufo (un identified flying object, not a flying saucer), i used this term as to not be conclusive of what i saw, after all, it is unknown, inconclusive. the neighbour dismissed my story, told me to call the cops, closed his door and heard him say i was a nutjob. i was hesitant about going back to my apartment, i was in a shocked, scared state, i felt the thing was after me from the first sighting. i called a relative from my smartphone and told her what happened and she told me to calm down and drink a glass of water, which i did. i was scared to get near the windows, which then had to get near them to close the curtains. i noticed certain people in front of my apartment, in the building where the object appeared in front of me had seen something as they were gazing from their windows and out into their balconies. i'm sure the top floor of the building in front of me witnessed seeing the object, they were two couples in that apartment that were looking through the windows and headed to the balcony as to indicate they had seen something. i tried to make hand signals to indicate if they had seen something (i'm pretty sure they had). i'm in the process of contacting these people to share what happened. overall i felt again, threatened and scared by this experience as this was the second time seeing this.
content.summary: A white blip occurred, then turned red.

content.detailedDescription: We were finishing having dinner on the deck.  it was still light in the nw.  a friend notice an odd light coming from the nw.  it was a very bright orange yellow light coming from the nw, towards the se.  we thought it was a meteor or ufo because it didn't look or act like a star, planet or airplane. the light flashed intermittantly, but not regularly. it took about 30 seconds to cross the sky, and pass out of sight, behind the trees.
content.summary: Intermittantly flashing orange yellow light flying straight from the nw straight to se.

content.detailedDescription: Retired law enforcement. my 10th incident since late 2010. this evening at 2148 hours walking out front of my house i observed from my left peripheral vision a bright light. i turned and looked and saw a vasilating very bright orange and red ball approaching from the ne quandrant of the sky at 30 degrees elevation approaching me. i observed it for about 5 seconds and recognized that it was not commercial or military air traffic due to the pulsating orange and red fireball characteristics. i am familiar with all aircraft both miltary and commercial, and have had two previous "red ball" unexplained sightings i repored before on mufon, but this one was different. i called out to my wife and famiy after about 5 seconds of witnessing this object, knowing it was was highly unusual because of it's color and pulsating nature. the "craft" approaced on a known path of commercial airline traffic, it held a constant heading and speed.....But it looked like a cauldron of fire, similar to the inside of a volcano....Vulcanism at work. the red and orange color pulsed and made the object look like it was on fire. there was no smoke trail, or embers falling from it. i saw a very small white light flash once on the bottom edge, and a very small green light flash once to the rear edge of it as it passed over. the object was brighter from it's forward leading edge and gradually diminished in intensity as it flew overhead at an elevation of 80 degrees and passed towards the west southwest. as it travelled away towards the sw it diminished in it's light intensity and dwarfed to a pinoint of light, same color....And faded away. last point of observation was approx. 45 degrees towards the sw when it winked out, similar to a satellite or the space station when they hit the line of termination. the only kicker here is that there was a high level of cloud cover, no stars present..With a lower level of fair weather clouds., altocumuous type. this craft passed under the cloud cover, and was not obscurred. this event happened in the atmosphere. it was witnessed by 4 people. i estimate the altitude of the object because of the cloud cover to be between 5-8k. at arms length it was the size of a small grape.
content.summary: Pulsating red and orange fireball observed by 4 individuals for approx. 25 seconds below cloud cover.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving when i saw the lights in the sky. i was only 100 feet from my house. i got out of my car, took out my cell phone and recorded them.
content.summary: Saw lights in sky, caught it on my cell phone.

content.detailedDescription:
On february 5, 2014, between 3-3:30 p.M., i was driving on i-90w in the spokane valley towards spokane, washington, when i saw what i thought was a very bright spot of sunlight coming through a layer of clouds above a ridge of small hills that runs from the sw towards the se.  i traveled approximately one tenth of a mile southerly toward the hills and the bright spot. (here the freeway loops to the west and more or less parallels the ridge.)  as i traveled closer to the hills, i could see that the bright spot was definitely not the sun reflecting through the clouds. i kept my eyes on it as much as possible and began to see it more clearly.   

what i saw was a bright and what seemed to be stationary spherical object in the sw sky. it was lower than the sun, which was shining from behind through light clouds.  the object was moon-like in appearance minus the shadows, and was now clearly in front of the thin layer of clouds.   it appeared to be a bright, glowing, light gold color with a smooth surface -luminescent rather than metallic.  light was not reflecting through it.  it appeared to remain stationery at about a 45 degree angle above the horizon.  as the direction i was traveling became more westerly, the object either rotated a bit revealing a somewhat faceted shape with what appeared to be two small triangular fins one above the other,  or my change of direction offered a different view. the fins appeared to be of the same material and color as the rest of the object. the edges were distinct as the sky behind was darker than object itself.  i also observed a very small, very black spot on lower right quadrant of the sphere, which at first seemed to appear and disappear so i wasn���t sure if i actually was seeing it.  the black spot then became quite visible and appeared to expand until it was very clearly a vertical rectangular shape that remained visible. the sides of the rectangle appeared to move inward at the center and it became an hour glass shape.

it is impossible to determine the size of this object from memory and at the time i didn���t think to mentally note any comparisons. what i can say for certain is i would not have been able to detect any of the attributes i���ve described when i first saw it in the sky and then suddenly i could see it well enough to see details, though i did not detect any movement.

at this point i left the freeway and drove two city blocks, parallel to the freeway, at 15-20 miles/hr.  i was stopped at stop lights twice and continued to observe the object, though my view was obstructed somewhat by vegetation and the descending sun made it more and more difficult to view.  at the second stoplight, i made a left turn to the south driving several more blocks and was able to continue viewing through the trees,  although it was now  slightly to my right.  at this point, the terrain obscured my view as i drove behind and up a small hill. at the top of the hill (about a minute later), i had full view of the sw sky and the object was gone.  

distance traveled from first sighting to last approximately three tenths of a mile.  
speed was 60-65 mph for first two tenths of mile, then not more than 15-20 for final tenth.  
total time of sighting was 3-4 minutes.
content.summary: Briight gold colored stationary sphere near spokane, wa

content.detailedDescription: The ufo was first hovering in one are, very bright green and apparent. it then dropped beyond tree line and shot back up in the air. it would change colors from green, then this fluorescent purple, then to blue. it was so noticeable to the naked eye. we watched this for at least 10 minutes if not longer, i have 3 different videos but the color is hard to make out. however, when it would change color you can see it light up and get very bright. it was glowing like a glow stick. not like lights on it, but the entire thing would take on whatever color and stay that color for some time before getting bright again and changing to another color. let's be honest, i was frightened.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering, lifted, dropped, changed from purple to green to blue. very bright, glowing.

content.detailedDescription: Lights were seen in groups of two on i 80 in various locatios starting at mile marker 240 from about 2 hrs, we were traveling east the blue lights went west fast after hovering, very bright and blinking and then hovered again after changing directions green lights stationary bright  and blimkimg very low maybe 20 ft of ground, below tree tops...White lights near underpass stationary vehicle stopped looking at it then through car in reverse, couple miles down another white light on side of highway which as we passed by flew directly at or vehicle no visible damage  yellow lights hobering near towers with lights and took of toward the west at a high rate of speed, all the lights moved very very fast no noise
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Going east on 80 saw lights blinking hoering and moved very fast no noise chaged directions

content.detailedDescription: I was jogging home. i happened to look up and saw the reflective orb. at first thought it was a plane, but when i stopped to really look, i saw that it was nothing like a plane. i thought maybe a balloon since it was round and slightly reflective, but then i noticed that it was moving straight and steady and then stopped to hover. when i got home and took out my binoculars, i saw it had a bluish glow. i've never seen a balloon with a bluish glow inside! also, it was almost 4 feet in diameter. i felt surprise, because i'd never seem anything like it and a little unnerved, because it was almost directly overhead and sort of hovering like it was watching. but it never did anything threatening or scary.
content.summary: Orb hovered, looked at it through binoculars, looked reflective but with bluish light inside

content.detailedDescription:
My first encounter was when i was 17. i was outside feeding my animals when a strange light and figures caught my attention in a field next to my house. i thought it was workers in their combines... but those were parked. i had noticed 8 very tall and off colored figures standing in the field next to their ship. prior to that i heard what i thought was a truck revving its engine ( sounded like a whirring sound) over and over again. an object darting back and forth in the sky. i shown my flashlight on them, they weren't human. i then went inside my gate to my house. i had lost 12 hours. i remember being on a ship with them.

the next time when i was 19, i heard the same noise again. my boyfriend at the time heard it too. i had a balloon next to my head, i had told him to take it out because it looked like their head.. i was sleeping i then woke up to see the damned balloon in my room, but when i woke up it was gone.. i told him i thought i told you to take it outside, he said i did.. apparently one was in my room. 

my step daughter went outside one night to take photos, we heard them and we saw them standing next to trees.. they blend in with trees. she took a photo, one was behind us. we came back inside and one had followed us and walked by where it cast a shadow on the ceiling outside. 

they come into my room. the greys... 

they come more frequently. hiding and blending in with things. my dog reacted to them once. they stand in shadows.

i took interest in the sound.. a whirring sound and them darting back and forth in the sky all the time.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on deck orange globe fast moving north to west tried to take pic no luck moving fast
content.summary: Orange globe fast moving

content.detailedDescription:
multiple objects, all "star-" or "orb-" like, some solo; others in staggered formation, but moving across sky intelligently, usu. 1 spotted, and another 1 or 2 trailing behind and adjacent as if in formation, and at same approx. rate of speed (steady & controlled, w/ instances of deliberate.

appeared as what healthy skepticism would deem a "satellite," but changed course and appeared as if performing some sort of reconnaissance or sweeping of visible geographic area under visible canopy of sky above.

at approx 0300 i went into my back yard to soak in spa. my neck & back killing me from hours on end at table studding for bar exam. i typically am in my yard, pool, and/or spa a few times throughout the night, and regularly notice star-like objects overhead (probably satelllites) as the object would move at a regular rate and in apparently set path, always singular and rarely going in-and-out of view.

last night the same objects were viewed, usu. not more than 1 per 5-20 min, as typical. i also noticed the objects reported, in addition to the normal near earth objects. this was completely different.

in the beginning objects were heading due south, and occasionally from s. at a mid-point in the sky overhead (location is 1/2  mi e. of 99 & at most n-e tip of stockton). sightings were ongoing, and increased in frequency until most concentrated just after 0420. b/w approx. 0500 on until sunrise washed away night sky all sightings were of objects moving in groupings of 2-3, always staggered both in order and flight path, with the lead being about the length from the next of 2 adult male hands at arms-length in- front of the face( i have no idea how far up from earth they could have been, so best way i could describe perspectively), the same was true of the 3rd trailing behind. however, on at least 1 sighting, there were first 2 heading back from the s-sw and at around the edge of town (8 mile rd & 99n) the lead object made steady change of course due e, the next followed, but then another (previously unseen) appeard from the nw (from lodi/elk grove direction) and interjected itself between these 2 others, thereafter all 3 took steady course e (slightly ne) towards direction of calaveras county/murphys (towards sierra nevadas), and maintained that direction until out of eye sight. apart from the suddenly appearing behavior, all others spotted until dawn took same eastern route.

just before i began to see object heading e, and away, a much brighter sphere-like object (at night all i can see is light, so no way to distinguish size, shape, etc.=all would appear as round as any light in the dark) came directly overhead at slow steady pace, very bright, whitish w/ hues of orange-yellow, but not blinding like a headlight, more suttle, but very bright. it flew directly over my home and took that eastern course, only after did the other objects proceed to take the same course. this bright object appeared to be much closer (maybe 200-300  ft) and with absolute silence. neither this nor any others had any lights regularly seen in known aircraft. nor did any of them exhibit sound or other behavior typical of modern day aircraft. i was well-trained in all aspects of aeronautics and aircraft mechanics while in the navy. i have some knowledge at least of flight characteristics and demands of physics.

this was not something i can put in that class of modern technological capability.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Multiple objects, all "star-" or "orb-" like, some solo; others in staggered formation

content.detailedDescription:
Bright orange, glowing objects moving north, steady speed. a group of three that appeared similar to loose military formation. 30 mintues later, 4-6 more object travelling same direction. they appeared to be ascending, but that is difficult to tell not knowing the size, distance, etc.

my wife and i were downtown des moines and we both saw them.

the speed would be consistent to that of jet aircraft departing the airport. there were no familiar indication to that of aircraft. no strobes, position lights, etc. just and intensely bright orange glow.

watching the second set, i thought maybe it was military aircraft departing the airport, the bright orange explained by afterburner, so i stopped the car, and rolled down window and stuck my head out to listen. no sound of aircraft whatsoever.

the objects eventually disappeared into the distance.
content.summary: Bright orange objects moving north, steady speed.

content.detailedDescription: I was roaming on the terrace. then i saw a bright round thing in the sky.I coldn't guess what was it. i never seen anything like it before. it was round and emiting light contiuously. it appeared from ne and disappeared in south diection. i was just watching it till it disappeared. then i thought that it was an ufo. i told my friends. but no one believed me.
content.summary: It was circular bright thing oved from ne to south in 10 seconds and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I went out after midnight to take a photo of the moon in that was the night it was closest to the earth...I took several photos and then came inside to see them when i noticed the object seemed to have orbited the moon and did not seem to return...
content.summary: This was a circular object that seemed to circle the moon as if it was on a specific course

content.detailedDescription: On or about april 7  at 1100 pm my lights dimmed  very low  then came back up 3 times then went out for good  so we  finally went to sleep  ive never seen the power go out like that usually juct goes out.  the next morning    visited my friend rob who lives on the main highway [rt66]  i asked him about the power going out because his dad is the retired firechief  he told me  when the lights  went out  he noticed light from a fire about a half mile away he got into his car  and went to check it out   when he got to  the fire  a az highway patrol officer  was on scene my friend said the cop was  standing there with his mouth open there was a perfect swath of fire about 10 to 20 feet wide  about 80 ft long  with straight edges the fire department came and put the fire out . now heres what seems odd to me, right over where the road of fire started was where the power lines were snapped directly under the power lines is a fence that was not harmed in any way seems to me some thing came in from the east to west snapped the lines  and made the fire  my friend told me when his dad called his old fire station the fireman on the other end didn't really want to talk about it and tried to tell him he had another call when he pressed him the fireman just said  we don't know what broke the lines and hung up when i went and looke at the area in question i was there 30 min when i got home i became dizzy and sickfor an hour or so                                                                                   i would be glad to answer any questions you have                                                                                                       i can be reached by phone.
content.summary: Somthing came down from sky snaped power lines  left burning swath  ten ft wide with  perfect edges 80 ft long

content.detailedDescription: There are many sightings with time an dates.Pictures of craft an their engines. pictures of aliening in space craft an jet packing around. this is over a 3 month period. you will need to enlarge them. i am using my wifes e mail address . jerry i will be gone in two weeks so please contact me.
content.summary: Human with 9 fingers an floating in air an creatures in vehicles

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were in the backyard beside our firepit relaxing. i noticed bright red lights moving in the sky first, watched them move right to left (about a mile away above the trees, mostly red with a yellow blinking - irregular beat). it then moved closer and i realized i was seeing something weird. i told my husband to turn around because i was looking at something very odd. 
it was hovering at that point, then moved towards us (closest it got to us - maybe 0.25 miles away). we watched for half a min before we agreed this was very weird. he got out his phone and started filming. (unfortunately the night-time contrast on phone filming stinks so there is no differentiation of treeline and sky, and lights are blurred together). 
at this time i could make out the object pretty well: cylinder shaped with a triangle top, lights were now separated into four horizontal and parallel rows of bright dots/bulbs. all were a bright red, with the bottom two rows adding green and yellow irregularly. we were very quiet and i swore i could hear it. it sounded like a quiet wind machine, maybe a slight buzzing. not as loud as a helicopter. this lasted approx. 10-15 sec. 
then it moved back so quickly, but smoothly, approx. 1 mile back, began hovering again and the lighting changed to a red x with a greenish irregular blinking light in the middle. occasionally more red lights in a thin line lit up on the right side of the x. i could not hear it anymore. this lasted approx. 10 sec.
then it moved further away and we were now only able to make out that it was a red light with a greenish light irregularly blinking. it moved right to left twice (maybe 5+ miles), up and down once, hovering short times in-between (all quickly, but so smooth). it was clear it was much further away at this point and as it was still moving right and down it went behind the tree-line.
we both could not believe what we just saw. we started talking and thinking about what it legitimately could have been... possibly the military base 30 miles away testing new aircraft, patrol over the highway nearby, the county fair 10 miles away providing interesting entertainment, or someone playing with a homemade drone to create hoaxes. 
then about five minutes after the first sighting it came back. it was further away, so we could not define shape and lighting lines, only color and movement. it flew in a similar way as before, right to left then up and down... quickly and smoothly. then it was gone behind the trees less than a minute later.
all we could say at this point was "that was crazy" and just kept staring at the sky waiting for it to reappear. we went inside after waiting about an hour for a re-sighting. it just didn't feel real, but we both confirmed exactly the same thing. i have really good eyes and my husband just got new glasses pretty much perfecting his vision. just crazy. 
please debunk this sighting for me. tell me there is another reason for this unidentified flying object in the sky. we know what planes and helicopters look and sound like. there were plenty of them in the sky that night, but this was definitely not one of them (the lights were too bright, the shape was different, the movement was different... it was nothing we had ever seen before). was there anyone else in our area that claimed a similar sighting last night?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Aircraft moved smoothly and quickly right to left a few times, came close and hovered, moved back and hovered, right to left again, then disappeared behind tree line. 5 min later came back, but not as close. right to left and hovering, then behind trees.

content.detailedDescription: Was watching what i thought was a satellite, but shortly after i noticed it, it flashed a very bright flash (very eye catching if looking even slightly up). i called three other adults on the patio to watch. we watched it slowly cross above and it flashed a very bright flash again. it did this only twice and began to fade away into the big dipper (south to north). suddenly there was another trailing behind it. again it looked like a satellite on a straight course. while watching this one it suddenly jumped ahead and caught up with the other one covering a vast space in the blink of an eye. then there was a third, then a fourth, then a fifth, then a sixth, in succession, spread out with many miles beteween them and all traveling south to north in the same line. at times they stopped and displayed a bright "light" ray coming out of them in a search-like mode. the light moved around. it didn't just flash once. they all were at the same altitide.... way up there. they would have looked just like satellites if not for what we observed them doing over a period of 15 minutes.
content.summary: Multiple satellite-like objects that "skipped" space and emitted beams over elk grove/sacremento ca.

content.detailedDescription: On monday evening july 14, 2014 i was standing in the backyard looking up to the eastern sky, it was about 9:00p.M.  i saw two lights, and thinking these two stars look so close to each other. now about with that thought the light on the right side started to ascend up and toward the south.  i am watching in disbelief and tell my wife to come from the deck to my spot and look at this. at the moment the pace the light was moving was so fast i said to her this is a ufo and we both knew this was no from earth.  the light continued to a stationary position in the s.E., high in the sky and then 3 or 4 pink to red lights started to fly around it in a jitterbug or fluttering type of movement.  we watched for 3 or 4 minutes until it became to difficult to see as apparently it was moving away or becoming invisible in another manner.
content.summary: Saw globe-like light first stationary then ascend at amazing speed to s.E. then stop.      then 3 or 4 fluttering type pink-red lights fly around it.  watched for 3 minutes or so before we could not see it.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were out fishing at the greenwood dam coming from newberry sc.  it was getting close to 10pm and we were loading the things into the truck.  it's weird bc it was like everything went quite then this hovering sound (like when you have a rope and start twirling it in circles next to you but deep) we look up twords the dam and there were bt 10-12 lights.  amazing, brighter than the north star white lights all in a row one after the other turning off and would turn back on like once it made it to the end from right to left.  the hovering noise continued and we didn't know what to do.  my husband and son said they were plains but come on in a perfect line and not blinking or other colors like normal and not noisy. my daughter grabbed the phone and started recording, to the shock that nothing showed up on the phone. i thought she was doing something wrong so i went and nothing. (we are all standing there looking straight at this fascinating once in a lifetime object and can't see it on camera). it took about 20 min for it to make it past us. once it was making its way past us it began to tilt bringing the left side down and the right side up not a complete 90 degree but i will have to say 70 degree change. it started to go back away from where we were and we noticed it completely left when a plain was coming in from our left. don't know what else to make of it.  we saw what we saw and will never forget. (oh and by the way our daughter wants to be a scientist now) please if anyone else has seen this let us know. also there were two other trucks out there that night maybe one day they will post or let someone know. oh also i do have the video of where we tried to record the lights.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Packing up from fishing, heard a hovering like sound looked up and saw 10-12 lights in a line one turning off and on after the other.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my wife were standing in our backyard when i noticed a bright white object in the sky towards the north. it was during the afternoon while it was still light outside, which got my attention because there were no stars in the sky because it was bright out. however this object was a very bright white sphere. it seemed to hover towards the north and traveled slowly towards the west and then seemed to travel southwest. although it moved slowly it moved much faster than any star would've during the earth's rotation. additionally, it maintained its altitude and shape for a duration of approximately an hour and a half to two hours. i watched it with a pair of binoculars and my wife had her compact digital camera. we took pictures during it travel and in the images it also appears to be a bright white sphere. towards the end of observing the object the sky had begun to dim, no stars were out yet, and the object was even brighter. i thought the object disappeared but my wife pointed it out to me. it was starting to blink and appear hazy/smoky. i quickly grabbed my binoculars and observed the object was no longer as bright because it was behind what appeared to be a smoke screen or it was emitting smoke. with the binoculars still focused i saw the object itself and five to six additional smaller white objects under the object. it looked as though these were coming out of the bottom of the original object, perhaps emitting them from itself. my wife could not observe the smaller objects with the naked eye nor did she see the big object blinknig, but did see the object appear to get dimmer and saw the smoke that was emitted from it. it then disappeared and did not reappear to us. i was completely in shock. in all of my years in observing the sky and searching for ufos i have never seen anything like this. i can remember yelling to my wife to look at what was happening. i still feel like it was almost unreal. 
   my wife took photographs of the main object in the sky and a video. video to be provided later.
content.summary: Bright white light in daytime sky that hovered, then traveled, blinked and emitted haze and 5-6 smaller white objects before fading out

content.detailedDescription: Quintal de minha casa consertando minha moto. estava sentado e luminosidade incomum chamou minha aten����o. um flash de luz no alto. me pus de p�� para ver o que era, pensando ser um drone. um ponto luminoso azul como se fosse uma das estrelas "tr��s marias" se movia no ceu em alta velocidade, dobrando em angulos, mudando de altitude e velocidade quase que instantaneamente. descartei imediatamente aeronaves humanas, pois n��o conhe��o nenhuma que acelere instantaeamente e fa��a curvas em angulo de 45 graus e fa��a um voo pairado horizontal depois de uma queda de uns 2km em velocidade terminal.Mudava de cores, tamanho  e comportamento na sequinte sequencia: fazia as manobras quando estava pequeno, com cor azul/branco/pulsante ou piscante. ficava fazendo pairados com aumento significativo de tamanho com cores vermelho, verde, laranja e dava um flash de luz em todas as dire����es, como se tirasse fotos, s�� que era alto no c��u, num horizonte de observa��ao de 45 graus, no m��ximo. o flash era forte o suficiente para me dar a impress��o de terminar amarelado. percebi que era incomum e sa�� em busca de testemunhas, nos quais consegui minha m��e que chegou a filmar o objeto,meu irm��o,cunhada e umas 15 a 20 pessoas da rua que tiveram a certeza de n��o se tratar de estrela ou sat��lite. o objeto emitiu umas 20 vezes este flash, subiu numa velocidade idiota e ficou est��tico, como se quisesse "disfar��ar" de estrela, mas efetuou um movimento horizontal r��pido e foi embora do campo visual em dire����o caucaia/praia, do meu ponto de observa����o. o avistamento durou mais de 30 minutos, tempo para que eu inocentemente tentasse contactar a torre a��rea de fortaleza, para informar o evento e o objeto. com a negativa do operador em me dar informa����es, voltei para minha rotina normal.O filme est�� na m��quina e n��o tivemos como passar pro computador, mas mando pra voc��s. ele estava neste momento lento, em vermelho, conforme eu disse antes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Luz pulsante azul, mudava de direção e altitude em angulo rapidamente, fazia pairados circulares e emitia um flash forte, quando pairava mudava de cores entre vermelho, verde e azul-branco e então emitia o flash. seguiu direção ne rapidamente.

content.detailedDescription: Will contact as im being washed off
content.summary: Landed sphere with being within & photographed, footsteps, sounds & messages, i photoed & green bubble with & mechanical type halo, then i had little 4ft greys, then a blue bubble then a cloud of entitys

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home. the moon seemed huge as it was low on the horizon, so, i was enjoying it while driving. i am driving east at this point and as i am getting closer to my sub development (about a quarter mile) i notice what appeared to be a plane at first move across my view of the moon in a north, northwest direction. as i get close to the gate of my sub development it was clear that this was no plane. it was now well below where clouds would typically form. it literally looked like fire drifting in the air with a red-orange glow around the fire. i heard no noise. i'm now pulled up to the gate of my sub development (facing south) waiting for the gates to open and now the object seem to be drifting towards my direction. i'm feeling a little worried because i almost felt as though it noticed me and was headed in my direction. i am very aware of this phenomenon so my curiosity kept me in control of my fear. i quickly pull into my driveway, get out to see where it is and i could no longer see anything. highly strange. it appeared to have covered a large area, but, never really seemed to move that fast. it simply had a drifting/floating type of movement. thank you for taking the time to review my account.
content.summary: Drifting fire ball

content.detailedDescription:
Many in a house of 12 see this objects many times a month other people see them their or many types an size some move very fast some hover an hang oround when i first saw one i took pictures, then videos i lived by my self on the first one that hovered over my house at about 150 feet i awoke in my corn feild sun burned no clothes i walked by home cell phone was working it wasn't when i first saw the object, i called my aunt she is a nurse practitioner she came took me to er i passed there psychiatrist test only then wood dr treat my wonds i now live with her i've had an object removed from back of the neck on spine ne'er have of head and now have many cindler in lungs liver brain dr or at a loss to know what it is i've been treat ed for histoplasmose for 9 months but no affect health getting worse i have no memory of anything after i first saw the object until i awoke some 6 hours later i know stay up watch ing these object. photographing an  video tape them i'm retired military except for injury form duty i was in perfect health before this event. there have been many crop circle an. bruned shaps in the crops thiscounty is a large farming county many have made the paper my dog a army dog died from unknown reasons, just after this after seeing 1to night i deecied to contact you
please inlarge the pictures an video i took them to night.
content.summary: Seen this. one an many more 15_20times a month other types
